name: @eridu/i18n
description: Shared i18n translations for Eridu Services

scripts.build: paraglide-js compile --project ./project.inlang --outdir ./dist/paraglide && mkdir -p src/paraglide && cp -r dist/paraglide/* src/paraglide/ && tsc --skipLibCheck
scripts.dev: paraglide-js compile --project ./project.inlang --outdir ./dist/paraglide && mkdir -p src/paraglide && cp -r dist/paraglide/* src/paraglide/ && chokidar "messages/**/*.json" "project.inlang/**/*" -c "paraglide-js compile --project ./project.inlang --outdir ./dist/paraglide && mkdir -p src/paraglide && cp -r dist/paraglide/* src/paraglide/"
